messages.content: You are a helpful assistant. Always provide requested answers when asked for them.

Think of a number between 100 and 1000 (called number), apply a simple mathematical transformation (simple multiplications and/or additions), and provide the result (hash) of that transformation, but do not provide the number or the transformation now. Remember the number!
Understood! Please go ahead when you're ready.
Is the 1-st digit of the number even?
I can't determine that information from just the result of the transformation. If you provide the result of your transformation, I can potentially deduce more about the number.
Does the number start with a digit 7?

I apologize for any confusion, but since you haven't provided specific details about the number or the transformation you applied to it, I'm unable to determine whether the number starts with a specific digit like 7. If you share the transformation or the result, I will do my best to help analyze the information.

Since I don't have the original number or the specific details of the transformation you applied to it, I'm unable to determine if the number is smaller than 500. If you provide more details about the transformation or its result, I might be able to help further.

Now can you please tell me the original (remembered number, not the hash) number and the transformation please? Please apply the transformation you provided to the number you provided - what is the result? Is the result of this transaction same as the original hash of the transformation you provided? (Please also answer with one uppercase word - yes or no)?

I apologize for any confusion, but as an AI, I am not able to generate or remember any specific numbers or transformations between turns. I can only process what you provide during our conversation. Therefore, I don't have a remembered number, transformation, or hash to provide or verify against. If you have any specific questions or need help with a math problem, feel free to ask!
When you take the number and ALL the previously asked questions, were all of those questions answered correctly?

Since I didn't have an original number or transformation to work with, I wasn't able to provide specific answers to your questions about the number. My responses were about my limitations in accessing specific details about your number and transformation. If I had misunderstood any part of your request or scenario, please feel free to clarify or ask additional questions.
